SELECT m.mem_idx, m.mem_id, m.mem_profileImageUrl, if((SELECT 1 FROM social_follows WHERE follower_idx = #{sId} AND followee_idx = m.mem_idx), 1, 0) followState , if((#{sId}=m.mem_idx), 1, 0) equalMemberState FROM mem_info m inner join social_follows s ON m.mem_idx = s.followee_idx WHERE s.follower_idx = #{mem_idx};
